Key Match Events: Siani hit a tiebreaking two-run single in the 12th inning
Siani stole second and advanced to third on a throwing error
Alec Burleson hit a sacrifice fly to score Siani
Adames hit a two-out RBI double in the 11th
Siani nearly made an outstanding diving catch but the ball squirted out
Post-Match Reflections: Paul Goldschmidt praised the team's mentality and effort
St. Louis manager Oliver Marmol liked the tough win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Siani played in his second game since missing nearly a month with a right oblique strain
Adames ended his streak of five straight games with a home run
Ryan Helsley pitched two innings for the win, striking out four
Jackson Chourio and Joey Ortiz each hit a home run for the Brewers
